GSD.product_version: versions from v3.9 to before v4.9.326
GSD.description:
vsock: Fix memory leak in vsock_connect()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.326 by commit 09fc7ffdf11d20049f3748ccdef57c9a49403214, it was introduced in version v3.9 by commit d021c344051af91f42c5ba9fdedc176740cbd238. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: vsock: Fix memory leak in vsock_connect()
